Description.SourceString: Elixirs are rare items that can be consumed to permanently increase the stats of a Hero. Each Hero can only consume a limited number of Elixirs. As Heroes gain rank (through promotions), they will become stronger and can safely consume more Elixirs.
Description.LocalizedString: Elixirs are rare items that can be consumed to permanently increase the stats of a Hero. Each Hero can only consume a limited number of Elixirs. As Heroes gain rank (through promotions), they will become stronger and can safely consume more Elixirs.
